document.full_text: three children were injured on tuesday at a houston elementary school when a gun fell out of a 6-year-old's pocket and went off in the cafeteria, houston independent school district officials said.
document.title: 6-year-old brought gun to school, three kids hurt
lines_and_colors: three children were injured on tuesday at a houston elementary school when a gun fell out of a 6-year-old's pocket and went off in the cafeteria, houston independent school district officials said.
